Configuration

configNamevaluesdefault
com.inmobi.databus.metrics.enabledtrue / falsefalse
com.inmobi.databus.metrics.period(time between polls)in seconds10
com.inmobi.databus.metrics.gangliatrue / falsefalse
com.inmobi.databus.metrics.ganglia.serverNamenull
com.inmobi.databus.metrics.ganglia.portnull
com.inmobi.databus.metrics.consoletrue / falsefalse
com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.slidingwindowtimein seconds1

Please keep the com.inmobi.conduit.metrics.slidingwindowtime and com.inmobi.databus.metrics.period same to avoid loss of metric. To start with keep both of them as 10.

Metrics

Namedescriptioncontextexample
failuresno of failure, 1 per runper thread./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.failures.LocalStreamService_testcluster1_test1@
commit.timetime to commitper thread./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.commit.time.LocalStreamService_testcluster1_test1@
filesCopied.countno of files commitedper stream./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.filesCopied.count.test1
emptyDirno of empty dir createdper stream./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.emptyDir.create.test1
retry.checkPointno of checkpoint retriesper stream./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.retry.checkPoint.test1
retry.mkDirno of mkdir retriesper stream./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.retry.mkDir.test1
retry.renameno of rename retiresper stream./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.retry.rename.test1
runtimetime taken per runper thread./LocalStreamService.htmlLocalStreamService.runtime.LocalStreamService_testcluster1_test1
purgePaths.countnum of files purgedper thread./LocalStreamService.htmlDataPurgerService.purgePaths.count.com.inmobi.databus.purge.DataPurgerService
deleteFailures.countnum of failures happened while deleting pathsper thread./LocalStreamService.htmlDataPurgerService.deleteFailures.count.com.inmobi.databus.purge.DataPurgerService
